channel.title: Need help with my NPC drops!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im really confuzed! Im creating a new server from a 'blank' server called defaultscapeV2!
When i kill something it seems to drop RANDOM stuff! This is really anoying... Ive looked in my npcdrop.cfg file but theres nothing in there...
PLEASE help!!
~Johno
(Ps. if you no how to make safe and attackable zones please post aswell!)
